name: Ultimate Dragon Outrage
description:
This is a game made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare #40 Game Jam.

Made with the Godot 3 Beta so bugs may prevail.

The theme is "The more you have, the worse it is"

So I made everything scale according to your power level.

Tell me what power level you archieved!

Rate the game at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/ultimate-dragon-outrage
